name: Spacestriker
description:
Hello everyone :)

This is a very short side-scroller 2D shooter I made for my game dev training course.

You control the ship with the keyboard Arrows (Up / Down / Left / Right)

You shoot with the Space key.

The more enemies you kill, the more points you get.

You only got 1 hp, but you can pick a shield on dead enemies (if they dropped it) to gain one more.

Defeat the boss to complete the level. (There are just 2 levels for now)

Enjoy !
